lead_paragraph: Pepe is a talented singer, however, he also is often insecure. One day during an event, he meets April, a very nice and pretty astronomer.  There is instant chemistry between Pepe and April, and Pepe is sure that he has experienced love at first sight and that she is the perfect woman for him.  But April is getting married that night. There is not much time for Pepe to convince her.
